#summary Examples of the data structures used by this plugin (technical docs)
#labels Function-Reference

= Definition data =

Stored in the *wp_options* table under the key specified by the`CCTM::db_key` constant, currently *custom_content_types_mgr_data*

= Settings =

Stores other settings used by this plugin, stored in the *wp_options* table under the key specified by the `CCTM::db_key_settings` key, currently *custom_content_types_mgr_settings*.
